skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: 7Spade

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation files with brand guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities. Pure prompt-based reference material.

content.value_statement: You need consistent brand styling for your documents and presentations. This skill provides Anthropic's official brand colors and typography guidelines to apply professional visual identity.
actual_capabilities: Apply Anthropic main colors (dark, light, mid gray, light gray)
Apply Anthropic accent colors (orange, blue, green)
Apply Poppins font to headings (24pt and larger)
Apply Lora font to body text
Automatic font fallback to Arial and Georgia
limitations: Does not install fonts on your system
Requires python-pptx library for PowerPoint formatting
Fonts must be pre-installed for best results
Limited to documented brand colors only

use_cases.title: Style Corporate Presentations
use_cases.description: Apply consistent Anthropic branding to PowerPoint presentations and slide decks

use_cases.title: Format Technical Documents
use_cases.description: Create branded documentation with official colors and typography standards

use_cases.title: Produce Marketing Materials
use_cases.description: Generate on-brand visual assets with official accent colors and fonts

prompt_templates.title: Get Brand Colors
prompt_templates.prompt: What are Anthropic's official brand colors?

prompt_templates.title: Get Brand Typography
prompt_templates.prompt: What fonts does Anthropic use for headings and body text?

prompt_templates.title: Apply Brand to Document
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand styling to my presentation using the orange accent color

prompt_templates.title: Full Brand Reference
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me the complete Anthropic brand guidelines including all colors, typography, and application rules

output_examples.input: What are Anthropic's official brand colors?
output: Main Colors: Dark (#141413), Light (#faf9f5), Mid Gray (#b0aea5), Light Gray (#e8e6dc)
Typography: Poppins for headings (24pt+), Lora for body text

best_practices: Pre-install Poppins and Lora fonts for optimal brand presentation
Use accent colors to maintain visual interest while staying on-brand
Apply automatic font fallbacks to Arial and Georgia for cross-system compatibility
anti_patterns: Using non-standard colors that deviate from official brand values
Applying custom fonts without proper fallback configuration
Mixing accent colors arbitrarily without following the established color cycle

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: Does this skill install fonts on my system?
faq.answer: No. Fonts must be pre-installed in your environment for best results.

faq.question: Can I use this skill without python-pptx?
faq.answer: Python-pptx is required for PowerPoint formatting. The skill provides reference information for any application.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains only reference data with no network access or file writing capabilities.

faq.question: What if the fonts are not available?
faq.answer: The skill automatically falls back to Arial for headings and Georgia for body text.

faq.question: How does this compare to other branding skills?
faq.answer: This skill provides official Anthropic brand values directly from company guidelines with no external dependencies.
